notes:
Recently several citizens of Port Hope have vanished. It is rumoured that they were killed by a crocodile. The people call it 'Snapper'.

{{JSpoiler|Part of the [[Killing in the Name of... Quest]]. It cannot be killed until [[Grizzly Adams]] lets you enter the teleporter.}}
name: The Snapper
behaviour: The Snapper is a [[melee]] combatant so chases its opponent, but runs in very low [[health]].
location: 1 floor down in the [[Tiquanda Reptile and Crustacean Caves]], in its own room accessible through a teleporter, which is located {{Mapper Coords|127.96|127.202|8|4|text=here}}.
strategy:
Kill it like a normal [[Crocodile]].
[[Paladin]]s and [[Mage]]s: There is a big rock in the middle they can run around and shoot at him from.
[[Knight]]s: If your level is lower than 20, bring potions because he has a high defense and you won't hit too much. Image:The_Snapper.jpg|The Snapper being killed Image:The_Snapper_room.png|The Snapper's entire room
